trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Hollywood
There were no other sightings in Hollywood on or around July 16th 2011
Summary: While driving north on I 95 my wife, son and myself briefly observed a group of dark orange lights in the west in the rough shape of the Big Dipper
divs: sighting detailswe had finished dinner with our daughter's family and began to head home on i 95 from sterling road. my son was driving, my wife was in the middle of the back seat and i was in the front passenger seat. as we approached 595 my wife observed lights to the west. she told my son who nudged me and told me to look out the window. i \ we observed about 9 - 12 dark orange \amber lights in the west roughly in the formation of the big dipper. the open end of the "cup" was facing north and the handle curved slightly towards the ground. i would guess at arm's length it was about 5" from top to bottom. my wife said there was no movement but due to overpasses my wife saw them from 595 to the davie blvd exit. i only saw them for about 10 seconds. we pulled off i 95 at broward blvd to try to see them again but they were gone. they appeared to be a reasonable distant west of i 95 but the proximity to the fort lauderdale airport and the flight path from the west made it seem as though there would have been some observation from airport personal.
